Text:
Howdo, Im new to this so bear with me. How do I burn this to play it on my chipped Wii?
Thanks for any help..
Go to tehskeen.com and look around the Wii section. You should find a tool called the multigame iso creator, you can use that to put multiple gamecube games on one disc.
